thig16.1:3.3: Kimaṅgaṁ pana → kimaṅga pana (bj, sya1ed, pts1ed, pts2ed); kiṁ pana (?)
thig16.1:15.3: anīkaratto → aṇīkadatto (bj); anikaratto (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed)
thig16.1:21.3: Chuddho → chaḍḍito (sya1ed, sya2ed); chuṭṭho (pts1ed, pts2ed, mr)
thig16.1:22.1: Chuddhūna → chaḍḍūna (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed); chuṭṭhuna (mr)
thig16.1:29.2: pīḷiyamānassa → kilissamānassa (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed, mr)
thig16.1:33.3: pidahitvā → pidhetvā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); padhatvā (pts1ed, pts2ed); pidhitvā (mr)
thig16.1:34.1: ca → pāsādeva (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed)
thig16.1:37.4: Mātāpitaro te dukkhitā → mātāpitaro ca te dukhitā (?)
